Hello.

My name is Yao Zongbin.

姚宗彬 (yáo zōng bīn)

我对前端开发充满热情,我可以使用Vite构建工具快速构建Vue.js项目。我的个人博客作品是开源的，可以在 GitHub或 Gitee上查看。 除此之外，我还有多个实际项目开发经验，包括 Vue2-Coding-Introduce， Vue3-Vite-Admin， React-Todolist， jQuery-Demo等。

I'm passionate about front-end development. I can use the Vite build tool to quickly build Vue.js projects.My personal blog posts are open source and can be viewed on GitHub or Gitee. In addition, I have multiple practical project development experiences, including Vue3-Vite-Admin, React-Todolist, Vue2-Coding-Introduce, jQuery-Demo,etc.

其他技能:
了解 ES6， TypeScript等；
了解 Mysql ， Node.js ， Java等；
熟悉 Github Pages， Zeabur， CloudFlare 前端静态化部署；
熟悉 Photoshop ，Axure 等设计工具，能够进行复杂的设计；
了解 剪映， Premiere视频剪辑软件，能进行复杂的视频剪辑和制作。

Other skills:
Understanding ES6, TypeScript,etc;
Understanding Mysql, Node.js, Java,etc;
Familiar with Github Pages, Zeabur, CloudFlare,front-end static deployment;
Familiar with Photoshop, Axure, etc. design tools, able to complex design;
Understanding Capcut, Premierevideo editing software, able to perform complex video editing and production.

不要为过去而后悔，因为已经过去。也不要为将来而忧虑，因为明天还没有来。我们唯一能够把握的就是今天， 不念过去，不畏将来，活在当下。对于我们不可改变的东西，我们保持乐观，对于我们可以控制的事情， 我们要保持谨慎，做你该做的事情，并且接受它的事与愿违。加油！

Don't regret the past, because it has already passed. Don't worry about the future, because tomorrow hasn't arrived yet. The only thing we can grasp is today, Don't dwell on the past, don't fear the future, live in the present. For what we cannot change, we remain optimistic, and for what we can control, We need to be cautious, do what you should do, and accept that it goes against your wishes. Come on!
